todos.content: Review all style documents and components in style directory
Create implementation plan for POS theme based on style documents
Implement CSS/Tailwind styling changes to match the documented design
Ensure functionality is preserved during styling implementation
Test and debug the POS application after styling changes
Update title to show logged-in user instead of 'Nuevo'
Add missing buttons (Agendar, Notas, etc.) to POS screen
Replace payment modal with styled version from documentation
Implement AI modal as shown in documentation
Remove AI button from POS screen (should be in Reports section)
Update header to show store name, align left, make smaller
Add numeric keypad to payment modal
Fix transaction success modal to only appear after successful payment
Fix styling issues in Schedule Visit modal
